bug.author: DeNeutoy
bug.summary: PretrainedTransformerEmbedder does not pass masks to *transformer models
bug.description:
The huggingface repo accepts masks, we should definitely be passing them <denchmark-link:https://github.com/huggingface/transformers/blob/master/transformers/modeling_bert.py#L629>https://github.com/huggingface/transformers/blob/master/transformers/modeling_bert.py#L629</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/allenai/allennlp/blob/master/allennlp/modules/token_embedders/pretrained_transformer_embedder.py#L25>https://github.com/allenai/allennlp/blob/master/allennlp/modules/token_embedders/pretrained_transformer_embedder.py#L25</denchmark-link>
